Interface MeetingItem


  • public interface MeetingItem
    Meeting item interface.

      • setMeetingTopic

        Parameters:
        topic - Meeting topic.
        Returns:
        TRUE means able. FALSE not.

      • getStartTime

        long getStartTime()
        Get the meeting Start Time. It should be later than the actual time.
        Returns:
        The Start Time of current meeting.

      • setStartTime

        Query if it is able to set meeting Start Time.
        Parameters:
        time - The Start Time of meeting.
        Returns:
        TRUE means able. FALSE not.

        Returns:

      • getCanJoinBeforeHost

        boolean getCanJoinBeforeHost()
        Query if it is able to join the meeting before host.
        Returns:
        TRUE means that it is able to join before the host. FALSE not.

      • setCanJoinBeforeHost

        void setCanJoinBeforeHost(boolean canJoinBeforeHost)
        Set to enable the feature JOIN THE MEETING BEFORE HOST.
        Parameters:
        canJoinBeforeHost - TRUE means that it is enabled. FALSE not.

      • isUsePmiAsMeetingID

        boolean isUsePmiAsMeetingID()
        Query if the personal meeting number (PMI) is set as the meeting ID.
        Returns:
        TRUE means to use PMI as meeting ID. FALSE not.

      • setUsePmiAsMeetingID

        void setUsePmiAsMeetingID(boolean usePmiAsMeetingID)
        Whether to enable PMI as the meeting number.
        Parameters:
        usePmiAsMeetingID - TRUE means enabled. FALSE not.

        Returns:

      • isHostVideoOff

        boolean isHostVideoOff()
        Query if the host's video is turned off.
        Returns:
        TRUE means the video is turned off. FALSE not.

      • setHostVideoOff

        Set to turn off the host's video.
        Parameters:
        hostVideoOff - TRUE means that the host's video is turned off. FALSE not.

      • isAttendeeVideoOff

        Query if attendee's video is turned off.
        Returns:
        TRUE means the video is turned off. FALSE not.

      • setAttendeeVideoOff

        Set to turn off attendee's video when they join meeting.
        Parameters:
        attendeeVideoOff - TRUE means that the attendee's video is turned off. FALSE not.

      • getAudioType

        MeetingItem.AudioType getAudioType()
        Get meeting audio types.
        Returns:
        Audio types defined in MeetingItem.AudioType.

      • setAudioType

        void setAudioType(MeetingItem.AudioType audioType)
        Set meeting audio types. The user can get default audio types from account settings via AccountService.getDefaultAudioOption().
        Parameters:
        audioType - Audio types defined in MeetingItem.AudioType. Default value: VoIP.

      • getThirdPartyAudioInfo

        Set the information of the third party audio. User can get default third party audio information from account settings via AccountService.getDefaultThirdPartyAudioInfo().
        Parameters:
        thirdPartyAudioInfo - The third party audio information.

      • getRepeatEndTime

        Returns:
        The end time of the recurring meeting.

      • setRepeatEndTime

        boolean setRepeatEndTime(long time)
        Set the end time of the recurring meeting.
        Parameters:
        time - The end time. It should be later than the meeting Start Time.
        Returns:
        FALSE means that it is disabled to set the meeting duration.

        Returns:

        boolean isOnlySignUserCanJoin()
        Query if only signed-in user can join the current meeting.
        Returns:
        TRUE means that the meeting is open only for signed-in user.

      • setOnlySignUserCanJoin

        Set to enable the feature ONLY SIGNED-IN USER CAN JOIN THE MEETING via AccountService.isSignedInUserMeetingOn().
        Parameters:
        onlySignJoin - Only singed user can join the meeting.

      • getScheduleForHostEmail

        java.lang.String getScheduleForHostEmail()
        Get the email whose owner will be the host of the scheduled meeting.
        Returns:
        The email owner will be the host of the scheduled meeting.

      • setScheduleForHostEmail

        boolean setScheduleForHostEmail(java.lang.String scheduleForEmail)
        Set the email of user who will be the host of the scheduled meeting. If the meeting is scheduled for user himself, it will pass null or user's own email.
        Parameters:
        scheduleForEmail - The email of user who will be the host. Get the user list via AccountService.getCanScheduleForUsersList().
        Returns:
        FALSE means that it is able to specify the user as host. Otherwise not.
